value.title: Building relationships between tables when both have duplicates
value.excerpt: PowerPivot and Power BI Desktop only allow the creation of relationships between tables when one of columns forming the relationship does not have duplicate values.  In order to relate these two tables to one another, what we need is a third table with all distinct values from both tables. In this tutorial

value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)

Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table! value.title: How to Create Power BI TOP N Report (Power BI Top 10 / Top N Filter)
value.excerpt: Let me show you how you can create a Power BI TOP N Report , using a Top 10 or Top N Filter. As a bonus we will also compare this with another approach using the DAX TOPN Function. 👉 Download Power BI File in Video at https://web.learnpowerbi.com/download/  This is part of our complete TOP N playlist

value.title: Create paginated reports
value.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website

value.title: Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query, the right way.
value.excerpt: Concatenating columns in Power Query is not hard to do, but depending on the technique you use, you might get unexpected or wrong results. value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. You can now add buttons to your Power BI reports and configure actions for when they are selected.  Bookmarks and selections are a powerful combination with Power BI reports

value.title: Sort month name chronologically in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Have you struggled when dragging month name to a chart axis and it is sorted alphabetically in Power BI Desktop?
